fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check 2 players, you will attack one of them, cannot pick revealed roles.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If both targets are Town members, you will shoot the first target picked.
- If both targets are not Town members, you will shoot the least innocent one.
- If only 1 is a Town member, you will shoot the Town member but learn the other target is not a town member.
- Innocence tiers, the first target is shot on a tie.
> • Town member
> • Neutral Benign
> • Any other neutrals
> • Neutral Evil
> • Neutral Killing/Genocidal
> • Evil Faction members
